          <title>
            <string language="en">Bending of light</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbiegen des Lichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dépliement de la lumière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dobra da luz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Piegatura della luce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάμψη του φωτός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flexión de la luz</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows bending of light away from the normal in glass and water.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Verbiegen des Lichtes 
weg vom Normal im Glas und im Wasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le dépliement de la 
lumière loin de la normale dans le verre et l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a dobra da luz away do 
normal no vidro e na água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la piegatura della 
luce via dal normale in vetro ed acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κάμψη του φωτός μακρυά 
από τον κανονικό στο γυαλί και το ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la flexión de la luz 
lejos del normal en cristal y agua.</string>
          </description>
